218330.name: Smashmuck Champions
218330.description:
SmashMuck Champions brings you fast-paced and twisted MOBA mayhem through a community-driven development process. Play as a robot shark, platypus-unicorn, yeti huntsman and more as you crush players across the globe in player vs player combat. This free for all is F2P, so get ready and GET SMASHED!

Key Features

  • 5 game modes
  • 8 arenas
  • 600+ customizable items
  • 20+ Champions
  • Community created content
  • Daily Challenges and achievements
  • Leagues and events
  • Craft exclusive items
  • Custom games
  • Spectator mode

Upcoming Features

  • New Champions
  • New game modes
  • New arenas
  • New Skills, weapons and outfits
  • In-client tournament support
218330.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
